cn.description:
在这款简约爽快的塔防射击游戏中，玩家将化身镇守城池的弓箭塔，直面敌方如火车般沿轨道袭来的攻城车队。敌军每节车厢均携带独立生命值，需通过精准瞄准与快速连射逐一击破——箭无虚发才能阻止其逼近城楼！若敌方车队突破防线抵达塔下，则宣告失败；全歼车厢则逆风翻盘！

游戏以经典轨道推进玩法为核心，操作直观易上手：滑动瞄准、自动放箭，箭矢轨迹与攻速节奏考验你的临场反应。随着关卡推进，可强化弓箭手的攻击力、射速与暴击属性，体验“万箭齐发，摧枯拉朽”的畅快感！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防史诗冒险
cn.description:
全世界最令人着迷的防御游戏重磅回归 —— 欢迎来到《王国保卫战：前线》！ 

《王国保卫战：前线》规模更加宏大，战况更胜从前，堪称全新水准的快节奏、超迷人游戏玩法，可谓是实至名归。轻按指挥你的的部队，展开一场史诗级的冒险，保卫这片异国大陆免受飞龙、食人植物和地下世界可怕居民的侵害 —— 你完全可以利用华丽的新防御塔、关卡、英雄和众多好东西，助你将敌人碾碎！（别担心，我们仍然提供前作中的好东西，只不过现在已是陈年经典。） 

《王国保卫战：前线》涵盖众多内容，它就像是完全升级版的诱人火炮，将像素化的欢乐径直发射到你笑逐颜开的小脸上... 可疼了！ 

游戏

•  巩固异国新大陆的前线 —— 在沙漠、丛林甚至地下世界中坚守阵地！

•  八种全新专业防御塔升级！你可以用弩兵堡垒、强大的圣殿骑士、亡灵甚至地震机切开、烤焦和践踏你的敌人 —— 嘿，我们告诉过你会动摇一切的。

•  超过18种防御塔技能！释放死亡骑手、瘟疫毒云或刺客，暗杀你的敌人！

•  超过40位具有独特技能的敌人！随时待命，对抗沙漠沙虫、部落萨满、游牧部落和地下世界恐怖生物。

• 十六位传奇英雄。选择你的战士，训练他们的技能！

•  每个关卡都会出现特殊单位和特色！注意黑龙！

•  残酷无情的头目战！嘿，我们告诉过你会有这些升级...

•  70多个成就，让你尽享游戏时间！

•  经典、钢铁和英雄游戏模式，挑战你的战术技能！

•  三种难度模式！你是否准备迎接真正的挑战？试试困难模式吧！
振奋人心的配乐，圆润醇厚的旁白，加上图文并茂的动画效果，真令人陶醉其中而不能自拔！（自然也包括动画的鲜血效果。）

•  游戏内百科全书！真正的战士知己知彼... 对防御塔的了解也不例外。用功研读吧！

《王国保卫战》所获赞誉：IGN编辑精选游戏，Slide To Play必玩游戏，148 Apps编辑精选游戏，Jay is Games年度游戏，Pocket Gamer金奖，Touch Arcade 4.5/5，CNET。最佳iPad游戏

us.description:
RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities.

Whether you’re scanning for a mesocyclone’s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane’s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar’s scanning strategy.

Your initial app purchase includes the following:

• Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany
• 6-frame radar loops
• Two built-in providers for radar data
• Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US
• Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia
• NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes
• Inspector and distance tools
• Color palette options for radar data
• AllisonHouse data plan integration
• Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting
• mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL
• Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use
• Support for widgets and complications
• Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather:

• 30-frame radar loops
• Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes
• Severe weather watches in the US and Canada
• Special weather statements in the US and Canada
• Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions
• SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks
• WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US
• Local storm reports in the US
• Custom color palette support
• Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices)
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including:

• Everything in Pro Tier One
• 50-frame radar loops
• A third provider for US radar data
• NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive
• Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive
• Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive
• GOES East and GOES West satellite products
• NSSL’s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products
• NCEP’s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products
• Surface observations
• Atmospheric soundings in the US
• Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive
• More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps
• Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA
• Server-sent events for radar and warning updates
• Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices
• Family sharing support

If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period.

DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/

Please visit our web site for more information.

us.description:
--- Experience Your Music with Vythm ---
Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely.

--- Your Vision, Your Visualization ---
Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision:
- Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds.
- MIDI input for precise visual control.
- NDI streaming support for sharing your creations.
- Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more.
- Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments.
And much more!

The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription.

--- Input Formats ---
Select your music from a variety of sources:
- Import any mp3 or m4a files.
- Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported).
- Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases.
- Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration.

--- Record Your Masterpiece ---
Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece.

--- Share Your Thoughts ---
Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org.

If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm!

Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today!

在这款简约爽快的塔防射击游戏中，玩家将化身镇守城池的弓箭塔，直面敌方如火车般沿轨道袭来的攻城车队。敌军每节车厢均携带独立生命值，需通过精准瞄准与快速连射逐一击破——箭无虚发才能阻止其逼近城楼！若敌方车队突破防线抵达塔下，则宣告失败；全歼车厢则逆风翻盘！

游戏以经典轨道推进玩法为核心，操作直观易上手：滑动瞄准、自动放箭，箭矢轨迹与攻速节奏考验你的临场反应。随着关卡推进，可强化弓箭手的攻击力、射速与暴击属性，体验“万箭齐发，摧枯拉朽”的畅快感！

Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle.

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit.
Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp.

BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS!


• OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies!

• 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up.

• UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy.

• Fortify the frontier in exotic news lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld!

TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES


• 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies!

• Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon!

DEFEAT THEM ALL


• OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before!

• MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades...

MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT


• Hours of army with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements!

• IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up!

• CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills!

• 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode!

• PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline!

-----------------------------------------------------

PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5

https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService

Privacy Policy:
https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers:
We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

us.trackName: 腾讯视频-五十公里桃花坞5 全网独播
us.description:
电视剧热播：
《长安的荔枝》古代传奇大剧！雷佳音岳云鹏喜感郎舅大唐“荔”劫运荔枝
《绽放的许开心》反内耗极品爽剧！张雨绮韩庚半熟烈爱带娃试婚
《潜渊》多重身份连环迷局！黄晓明张佳宁暗夜潜伏上演谍战大戏
《焕羽》张婧仪周翊然青春之旅蜕变成长，踏浪逐风恣意翱翔！
《桃花映江山》刘学义孟子义互虐生情，落魄公主敌国和亲，攻心猎爱震荡朝堂！
《淬火年代》大江大河姊妹篇！张新成宋祖儿热血办厂逆袭，正午阳光年代剧上新
《陷入我们的热恋》现偶之光顶级上头！刘浩存王安宇要谈不谈得暧昧最撩人
《紫川之光明王》壮丽诗史！杨旭文刘宇宁张铭恩三兄弟热血燃战
综艺强档：
《让我来唱》天后萧亚轩复出首秀，史上最卷“全女声”音综重磅来袭，66人直播大战一触即发！
《哈哈哈哈哈 第5季》“舞王”邓超遇对手！王俊凯大跳抽象甩葱舞，这互联网是没他在乎的人了吗？
《开始推理吧 第3季》推理团徒手抓“丧尸”，演绎现实版生化危机，谁看了不说一句有极限逃生那味儿了。
《奔跑吧》每周五爆笑开跑，白鹿孟子义古装扮相美我一大跳，李昀锐走趾压板疼得嗷嗷叫。
《一见你就笑》大型短剧拍摄现场，杨迪搭戏杨超越被狠扇一巴掌？徐冬冬反向壁咚高瀚宇众人尖叫。
《毛雪汪》陈昊宇新专辑首唱绝美嗓音！独居惊魂记？陈昊宇自曝家里曾遭陌生男性潜入，毛毛雪琴瑟瑟发抖。
《天赐的声音 第6季》A-Lin黄子弘凡音浪太强，张碧晨周兴哲合唱声起心碎。
《朋友请吃饭 第3季》这是我能听的吗？孔雪儿颜安饭桌上狂爆剧组内幕，周洁琼姜珮瑶自曝“初始配置”，杨迪尹正全程惊讶脸。
《旷野星球》跟魏大勋王安宇到离地心最近的地方云探险，看溶洞内的“生命之树”，感慨大自然的鬼斧神工。
《进步班》章子怡分享《酱园弄》拍摄过程，李诚儒模仿张子枫唐探名场面。
电影超燃：
《制暴：无限杀机》硬核痛片!斯坦森血洗黑帮三代
《苍茫的天涯是我的爱》神曲改编笑果逆天！曾毅周奇爆笑公路奇旅
《雄狮少年2》豆瓣8.5分高口碑国漫，雄狮归来少年拳战擂台
《小丑2：双重妄想》影帝华金与LadyGaga飙戏
《穿越时空的少女》豆瓣8.6！日漫纯爱天花板
《楚幽秘境》鬼吹灯外传！古楚千年墓穴探险
强势动漫：
《诡秘之主》世界级作品，一键进入19世纪魔法世界
《诛仙 第3季》兽神乱世撼九州，诛仙再临证苍生，第3季热播中！
《遮天》四极破境，叶天帝横扫一切敌！
《仙逆》王林再战天道！这一次你依然带不走她
《神印王座》终局之战！龙皓晨战李正直！
《大猿魂》灵明赤尻通臂六耳齐聚，四大神猴来战！
精品短剧：
《彼岸灯塔》海风呜咽，命案连环。渔村小镇迷雾重重，连环凶杀案掀起陈年悬案！
《贵嫡》财阀贵女重启人生！踩碎渣夫恶妾算盘，爽爆复仇！
纪录片新热：
《早餐中国 第5季》：经典回归！一道传统早餐、一家有趣小店、一群忘我的食客，丰沛你的每一个清晨。
《中国刑侦实录 第2季》：围绕一系列离奇案件，每集聚焦一个震撼人心的真实故事，深入挖掘案件背后的真相与情感纠葛。
《人间惊鸿客 第2季》：走进李白、杜甫的惊鸿一世，深度解读千古诗人如何面对人生起落。
《惊魂高速公路》：危险超车、岔路撞车、轮胎爆炸……那些惊险的公路事故全记录！
《72种危险动物·亚洲篇》：盘点在广袤亚洲大陆上，生存的已知及鲜为人知的危险动物，揭开凶险共生的自然界致命法则！
《猎杀倒计时》：探索四大洲自然界强大的捕食者的世界，见证捕食者的原始力量和坚韧意志。
《西藏味道》：就爱这口西藏味儿！全方位展现西藏独具特色的饮食文化。
《乡野有真味·奇食》：深入竹林溪涧、古村深巷，探访颠覆味蕾认知的“暗黑”美食与新奇风味！
儿童节目：
《水晶岛守卫者》：能变猫，能变人，还能变成猫人守护城镇
《猪猪侠之竞速小英雄9》：面对重重困难，超星车队完成挑战重启比赛
《我是妹猪请多指教》：一起来看超治愈的熊猫成长日记！
《超级小猫战队：喵喵好伙伴》：小猫也能解决难题！看喵喵的超能力出击
